title: Should Lamar Play Without a New Deal? | Best of I AM ATHLETE Tonight Week Seven
description: Leger Douzable, Omar Kelly and Brandon Marshall react to Deshaun Watson speaking to the media at mandatory camp in an effort to clear his name. How should Watson be handling his accusations to the public? Should Kyler Murray become the highest-paid Cardinal in franchise history? Baltimore Ravens quarterback Lamar Jackson spoke to the media and discussed the possibility of playing without a new deal. IAA Tonight breaks down if he should even take a snap before he gets a second contract. The Warriors win their fourth championship in eight years. Is Steph top 10 of all-time?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Omar Kelly, Antoine Walker, Adam Pacman Jones, Brandon Marshall, Brandon Flowers)
